name: Earthflow: Fate of the Stargazer
storyline: You follow vivid memories of the legendary Arthus the Stargazer, who single-handedly cleansed his home planet from evil corruption and saved his people.
summary: An infinite runner game based on stomping and dodging mechanics (from Mario and Flappy Bird respectively). You take a role of the legendary Arthus the Stargazer, and embark on a quest of cleansing your home planet from the corrupt evil forces.
